title: Bruce4
author: Bruce4
content: Hi mates,I'm a newbie,I just want to share my thoughts on why I think failure is important,would like to know fromYou all perspectives.Recently,I've been taught a lesson in my life,which has got me thinking about myself and everything that has happened to me.Guess what it is? Failure!!When we fail,we grow and mature as human beings,we reach deeper meanings and understands ourselves more.I've heard people saying failing hurts and causes emotional guilt,and also inflicts regrets on victims.Failure as much as it hurts,is an important part  of life.In fact,failure is necessary because it's life's great teacher as it molds and shapes our lives.The most successful people in life have failed the most times,like a baby learning to walk,they had to fall down and stand up again.Some persons see failing to be bad or an abomination,but it's only a realistic factor that we should embrace.I'm not saying we should Turn failing to a lifestyle,but failure through it's life's altering lessons makes us better persons.It paves way for new ideas,self discovery,It helps us to be more resilient;the more we fail,the more resilient we become.It makes us to recognize opportunity that were hidden and Opens us up for new possibilities or opportunities that life has to offer,and its through failure that we can learn the greatest lessons that life could teach us.

Sometimes only what breaks us teaches us how strong we are. However, the most important lesson I learned is, we should be moving on as fast as we can. We can make excuses to feel better for a while, but the world won't wait for us.

comments.author: Qiubell5
comments.body: Failing in life is common. In the process, failure will always be there. I think from failure we can take lessons and become more mature. Can think deeper. From failure we get a lot of experience and lessons. It's just that, when we fail we have to keep holding on and not give up. no matter how many times we fail, we must get back up.

comments.author: Marshall Chord
comments.body: The lessons we learn from failures help us achieve future success.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: Failure indeed is really a great lesson in life. Without failure in life, the value of success will not be recognized. Failure is an eye opener, it makes you realise a lot of mistakes you have made in the past.A life without a failure is not worth living because failure is path of life that every human have to go through.

comments.author: Mikhalina Palaha
comments.body: I agree with you that failure is necessary because it teaches us life lessons that we wouldn't have learned otherwise. And, it's not just about learning from our own failures, but also from the failures of others. The most successful people in life have failed numerous times, and it's through those failures that they were able to learn and improve.Some people might view failure as a bad thing, but I believe that we should embrace it as a realistic factor of life. And, I'm not saying that we should go out and fail intentionally, but when we do fail, we should use it as an opportunity to learn and grow.

comments.author: Ucy
comments.body: Actually failure is a problem and it's not a good thing. We are meant to know things that lead to failure and do well to avoid them.But for the sake of not being perfect, humans would try to learn or achieve something through trial and error, but this should be done at a very small scale to reduce the amount of problem the failure would cause.

comments.author: Raceonsucced
comments.body: Because failure in life is needed to teach us valuable lessons. There we will know patience and be more careful about things, and know what mistakes will not be repeated in the future.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: Failure is truly very important for many reasons. One way to look at it is by thinking that if you don’t attempt to learn something new because of the fear of failing. Then you hold yourself back from learning and growing from the experience. The key to success also requires the process of failing along the way. If you fail you learn that we can pick yourself up to be better and approach the situation with a strategy. If you expect to be handed down everything to you then you won’t learn the lesson of hard work, dedication, persistence, and value in life. Failure allows us to regroup, and rethink how to better execute a plan for a successful outcome. Having persistence after many times failing is also another key element of success. Because will others have either quit or stop trying, you are only one step closer to success.

comments.author: Comingdown
comments.body: Failure is an important part of growing as a person. If you didn't fail, it just means that you're not trying hard enough. It teaches us the lessons that we gain from our mistakes and acquires wisdom from our experiences. Failure keeps us humble and it always reminds us that there is someone better than us and there's always room for improvement and errors. It also builds our mentality and thinks outside the box to come up with new solutions because we fail at a certain thing. Many successful people fail a lot in their early stages of life but came out in the world with their goals reached. It only means that those failures taught them lessons and lead them to success.

comments.author: ndutndut
comments.body: Failing is important. Because Failure can be an opportunity to learn and grow, but it can also be a disappointing experience and make us lose motivation.However, if we can respond well to failure, then it can be an opportunity to learn from our mistakes and become stronger and better. We can do some self-reflection and figure out what went wrong and how we can do it better.

comments.author: Klima Dorres
comments.body: I think it's important to acknowledge that failure is not always easy to deal with emotionally, but it can definitely be a powerful learning experience. I agree that failure can help us grow and mature as individuals. Personally, when we fail, it forces us to reevaluate our approach and think creatively about how we can improve next time. In many ways, failure can be seen as a necessary part of the journey to success.I also agree that some of the most successful people in life have failed numerous times before achieving their goals. Also takes persistence and resilience to keep pushing forward despite setbacks. I have one quote "Failure can also help us to recognize new opportunities and possibilities that we may have overlooked before"

comments.author: peter0425
comments.body: we must commit mistakes and failure to learn more and prevent same thing from crossing again.remember that experience is the best teacher of all so never be afraid of making mistakes .be live with fear but toughness .

comments.author: Celinadoris007
comments.body: To me failure is something you can't run away for no matter how successful you are, trust me you will pass through it. What amazed me about this failure is that it will make you stronger and sit you down to realize how weak you are.I believe failure is the build up of Success if you don't fail you can't know how it takes to be a successful.

comments.author: Shielding2002
comments.body: Failure serves as a lesson for a future success. That doesn't mean we should celebrate failure. In all you do try your best to avoid failure
